If you like all things traditional and stately in your home décor, you have a choice of finishes - antique gold, bronze, pewter, tortoise shell and more. [Wall sconces](http://www.bellacor.com/wall-sconces.htm) in transitional spaces in your home can be accented with sparkling wall lights featuring remarkably designed silhouettes that retain old world charm fused with modern, minimalistic appeal. If contemporary is your choice, you can opt for cascading or prism designs in addition to the up-to-date sconces boasting stunning craftsmanship. Where crystal wall sconces work best in your home Elegance shines in a new light with crystal wall sconces crafted exquisitely to enliven any space in your home. Softly lit wall sconces are a delightful accent for bedrooms and dining spaces. Living spaces are usually bright and do well with wall sconces offering multiple bulbs which pool light beneath crystals sparkle glamorously. Match the level of ornate detailing with the décor and think up novel ideas of installing wall sconces to beautify any space in your home. What to look for in the best crystal wall sconces The right wall sconce is a true reflection of your sense of style and evokes elegance while illuminating your space. Look for wall sconces that liven up your style while combining the best of functionality in your home.
